SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: THE IBM INTERNATIONAL FOUNDATION PROVIDED EDUCATIONAL AND SKILLS PROGRAMS TO FOCUS ON SKILLS NEEDED FOR 21ST CENTURY JOBS THROUGH THE FOLLOWING PROGRAMS:P-TECH IS A GROUND BREAKING EDUCATION MODEL WHICH COMBINES PUBLIC HIGH SCHOOL AND NO-COST COMMUNITY COLLEGE WITH PREPARATION FOR "NEW COLLAR" JOBS. P-TECH STUDENTS, PRIMARILY FROM UNDER-SERVED BACKGROUNDS, GRADUATE WITH A NO-COST ASSOCIATE DEGREE, ALONG WITH WORKPLACE EXPERIENCES INCLUDING MENTORSHIPS.SKILLSBUILD OFFERS FREE LEARNING, SUPPORT, AND RESOURCES FROM SECONDARY EDUCATION (STUDENTS AGED 13-18) TO ADULTS SEEKING ENTRY-LEVEL EMPLOYMENT. SKILLSBUILD PROVIDES SKILLS FOR ENTRY-LEVEL TECH JOBS.
